goal.title: Poner fin a la pobreza en todas sus formas y en todo el mundo

indicators.title: Porcentaje (%) de estudiantes que reciben becas o ayudas para estudiantes con bajos ingresos respecto al total de estudiantes matriculados en UPO
Percentage (%) UPO annual budget dedicated to scholarships and social assistance for low-income students with respect to the total annual UPO budget

goal.title: Poner fin al hambre, lograr la seguridad alimentaria y la mejora de la nutrición y promover la agricultura sostenible

indicators.title: Annual quantity (Kg) of food collected in the UPO food collection program
Percentage of cafeterias on campus that offer a menu with local and seasonal products and also have fair trade products over the total number of said establishments.

goal.title: Garantizar una vida sana y promover el bienestar de todos a todas las edades

indicators.title: Number and Percentage (%) of people from the university community assisted in health and well-being services/programs (psychological and medical care, vaccination...)
Percentage (%) UPO annual budget allocated to the area of ​​Health and Prevention of Occupational Risks

goal.title: Garantizar una educación inclusiva y equitativa de calidad y promover oportunidades de aprendizaje permanente para todos

indicators.title: Number of students enrolled.
No. of new students
Number of graduated students
Degree of satisfaction of the students with the (teaching) UPO
Student rate over number of Full-time PDI
Teaching Saturation Index (percentage of credits given with respect to the total possible)
Proportion (%) of first generation students (first generation of university studies in the family
Master's and Bachelor's Degree Academic Success Rate
Percentage ofstudent body? / university community?what has beenbenefited? / participated?of the measures/initiatives put into practice from the UPO campus for attention to diversity.
Number of people using the SADF service (annual)
Number of people with functional diversity enrolled
Number of people with functional diversity who complete their studies
Percentage (%) of the university community that participates in training actions for attention to diversity
Nº or Percentage (%) of the university population that participates in programs/activities that promote education for sustainable development
Number of specific masters to promote sustainable development, through education for sustainable development and sustainable lifestyles, human rights, gender equality
Percentage (%) of educational facilities that guarantee attention to diversity.

goal.title: Lograr la igualdad de género y empoderar a todas las mujeres y las niñas

indicators.title: Percentage (%) of enrolled women out of total students
Percentage (%) of female new students out of all new students
Percentage (%) of women participating in research and innovation projects
Percentage (%) of PDI women out of the total PDI of the UPO
Percentage (%) of PAS women out of the total PAS of the UPO
Percentage (%) UPO annual budget allocated to the Equality area
Number of people from the university community who participate in training and awareness-raising activities on equality
Number of interventions in application of the protocol against sexual harassment and for reasons of sex in the UPO
Number of people (PDI+PAS) ​​who take advantage of the reconciliation plans (including leave for care) of the UPO

Percentage (%) of women members of collegiate bodies (Management Council/Government Council) and in management teams (Dean Teams, Faculties and Schools Management) with respect to the total number of members
Percentage (%) of leading/principal researchers of research groups (UPO and competitive) out of total research groups
Percentage of women professors with respect to the total number of professorships

goal.title: Garantizar la disponibilidad y la gestión sostenible del agua y el saneamiento para todos

indicators.title: Average water consumption (litres) per person in the university community per year
UPO water footprint
Percentage of water reused
Percentage (%) UPO annual budget allocated to the sustainable management of water and sanitation in university facilities and the care of aquatic ecosystems

goal.title: Garantizar el acceso a una energía asequible, fiable, sostenible y moderna para todos

indicators.title: Percentage (%) of energy consumed that comes from renewable sources with respect to total consumption.
Percentage (%) of RITE buildings/facilities with an A, B or C energy efficiency certificate.
Energy consumption per enrolled student and staff (PAS/PDI/contractors) (kWh per person per year)

goal.title: Promover el crecimiento económico sostenido, inclusivo y sostenible, el empleo pleno y productivo y el trabajo decente para todos

indicators.title: Number or Percentage (%) of students with internships managed by the UPO (curricular and extracurricular)
Percentage (%) of students assisted by the professional/employment guidance service (service provided by the university)
Employment rate of graduate students after one year.
Percentage of UPO staff with a permanent contract.
Accident and incident rate per capita for the entire university community
Number of people participating in training actions related to occupational safety and occupational risk prevention.

goal.title: Construir infraestructuras resilientes, promover la industrialización inclusiva y sostenible y fomentar la innovación

indicators.title: Percentage (%) of the UPO's annual budget dedicated to research and development (R&D)
Percentage of Income from R&D with external funds over the total budget of the university allocated to R&D
Percentage of public income for R&D over the total budget of the university allocated to R&D
Percentage of private income for R&D over the university budget allocated to R&D
Number of patents or exploitation licenses linked to research carried out at the UPO
Number of spinoffs created.

goal.title: Reducir la desigualdad en los países y entre ellos

indicators.title: Percentage (%) of UPO staff with functional diversity
Percentage (%) students with functional diversity
Percentage (%) of university facilities and services certified in universal accessibility.
Number of older people participating in the 'Aula Abierta de Mayores' program
Number of agreements with entities that work in vulnerable areas of the city.
Nº or Percentage (%) of the university population that participates in volunteer activities (UPO Volunteer Office)
Percentage of cases resolved with respect to those reported to the university ombudsman

goal.title: Lograr que las ciudades y los asentamientos humanos sean inclusivos, seguros, resilientes y sostenibles

indicators.title: People / Percentage (%)? of the university community who usually travel using sustainable transport (on foot, bicycle and public transport).
Percentage (%) of parking spaces for bicycles out of total number of members of the university community
Percentage (%) occupancy of the Flora Tristán residence
People who participate in the 'Shared Accommodation' program
Percentage of surface area of ​​university campuses occupied by green areas and gardens.

goal.title: Garantizar modalidades de consumo y producción sostenibles

indicators.title: Kg/year/person of food discarded at the UPO facilities by the university community.
Kg/year per capita of Hazardous Waste generated in UPO laboratories and workshops
Tons of Electrical and Electronic Waste generated per year per capita on campus
Tons of plastic waste generated per year per capita on the UPO campus
Kilograms of used paper per capita recovered in selective bins on the UPO campus
Kilograms of glass used per capita recovered in selective bins on the UPO campus
Percentage of tenders in which ethical, social and environmental clauses have been included (beyond the law).

goal.title: Adoptar medidas urgentes para combatir el cambio climático y sus efectos

indicators.title: Carbon footprint. Direct and indirect emissions. Scope 1, 2 and 3.
Number of investigations on climate change.

goal.title: Conservar y utilizar sosteniblemente los océanos, los mares y los recursos marinos para el desarrollo sostenible

indicators.title: Number of R+D+i and transfer projects/programs focused on the conservation of oceans, seas, lakes, rivers and marine resources
Academic/training offer in aquatic ecosystems from a perspective of conservation and sustainable use of its resources

goal.title: Proteger, restablecer y promover el uso sostenible de los ecosistemas terrestres, gestionar sosteniblemente los bosques, luchar contra la desertificación, detener e invertir la degradación de las tierras y detener la pérdida de biodiversidad

indicators.title: Campus Biodiversity Index (existing and reintroduced)
Number of protected species present on campus (red list)
Number of invasive plant species removed from campus
Academic/training offer in conservation and sustainable uses of terrestrial ecosystems
R+D+i and transfer projects/programs focused on the conservation and management of soils and terrestrial ecosystems

goal.title: Promover sociedades pacíficas e inclusivas para el desarrollo sostenible, facilitar el acceso a la justicia para todos y construir a todos los niveles instituciones eficaces e inclusivas que rindan cuentas

indicators.title: UPO Transparency and Accountability Index
Participation of the university community in decision-making.

goal.title: Fortalecer los medios de implementación y revitalizar la Alianza Mundial para el Desarrollo Sostenible

indicators.title: Volume of euros (financing) obtained annually for development cooperation projects (compared to previous editions)
Percentage (%) of students / teachers who participate in development cooperation activities with respect to the university community
